Event Calendar
Alongside daily planned family-friendly resort activities, Captiva Island is abuzz with experiences and events. Explore the latest happenings near South Seas Resort.
Featured
Labor Day Weekend
Soak up the final days of summer with family-friendly fun across the resort. From beach games and live entertainment to special dining experiences and sunset celebrations, Labor Day Weekend at South Seas is the perfect island sendoff to the season.

BOOK NOW
Homes of Distinction
Vacation Rentals
About
Welcome to South Seas, where timeless memories meet reimagined experiences on the shores of Captiva Island. Explore expanded amenities and services coming soon to guests and owners with Club Captiva access, browse our shop, navigate the resort through interactive maps and photo galleries, read our blog, and more.
The
only
way to experience South Seas - book through South Seas.
Club Captiva amenities are exclusively available to South Seas guests and owners. Booking your stay through South Seas is the
only
way to experience the resort’s unparalleled amenities including resort pools, The Clutch golf, food and beverage, fitness, beach services, water sports, and coming soon…Captiva Landing water park, exciting new dining options, and The Spa at South Seas!
No one else on the island can offer access—because they simply don’t have it.
Coming Soon
South Seas is working diligently to better serve our guests with reimagined spaces, refreshed venues, new menus, and expanded resort amenities. While many new developments have already opened, discover what else lies in store.
Learn More
View Gallery
↔
Shopping
Bring a piece of South Seas with you—no matter where you go. Shop our collection of branded apparel and accessories.
Learn More
View Gallery
↔
Gallery
Prepare for your South Seas visit with a photo preview of the amenities, activities, and accommodations awaiting your arrival.
Learn More
FAQ
Seeking more information? Explore answers to some of the most frequently asked questions about South Seas.
Learn More
Resort Map
Familiarize yourself with the resort before your arrival. With two-and-a-half miles of Gulf beaches and a variety of exciting amenities, there is so much to discover.
Learn More
Getting Around
At just five miles long and barely one-half mile wide, it may not be surprising to learn that the preferred modes of transportation on Captiva Island are electric resort carts, bicycles, the trolley, or on foot. Whatever way you choose, leave your car keys behind and embrace the relaxing change of pace.
Learn More
View Gallery
↔
Giving Back
At South Seas, we believe in making a difference through meaningful contributions to our community and environment. In 2024 we started the annual Tarpon Tournament benefitting Folds of Honor and scholarships for the local community.
Tarpon Tournament
Blog
Stay connected with the latest at South Seas, from tips for finding the most precious shells on your next visit to festive happenings at the resort.
Learn More
News & Press
Stay informed about the latest news, press releases, and media coverage related to South Seas.
Read More
Cashless
Transactions
Enjoy the convenience of cashless transactions throughout the resort. Resort charging privileges are seamlessly established upon check-in for guests to enjoy all Club Captiva amenities, as cash and credit cards are not accepted on the property. This streamlined experience ensures every moment of your stay is focused on relaxation and enjoyment, free from the worry of carrying your wallet.
